aka: Our Father – The Last Days of a Dictator
awards:
第54届鹿特丹国际电影节(2025)
　　大银幕奖 最佳影片(提名) 何塞·菲利普·科斯塔

director.name: 何塞·菲利普·科斯塔 José Filipe Costa

this_title: Pai nosso – os últimos dias de Salazar
trans_title: Our Father – The Last Days of a Dictator
introduction: Portugal, 1968. Salazar, the longest-serving fascist dictator, falls from his chair and suffers a stroke. Returning to his Palace to recover from illness, he is no longer President. No one reveals this him: neither his loyal housekeeper, nor his hard-working maids, nor his doctor.
foreign_title: Pai nosso – os últimos dias de Salazar
